post.author: 이홍식
post.content:
안녕하세요, 이홍식이에요. 아래 기술 가지고 계신분이 있으심, 416-226-3977로 전화주세요.
(position must be filled by August 23)
datacomm background, understanding of networking protocols (TCP/IP, RTP,etc), software skills: Linux, scripting, etc, familiar with VoIP signalling protocols (MGCP,SIP, etc), working knowledge of VoIP network elements: soft switches, media gateways, media gateway controllers, routers, VLANS, familiarity with VoIP quality of service issues.
Candidate must be willing to travel (in the US), have strong witten and verbal communication etc.
Renumeration will be approx. $10,000 per month. ($60 per hour) or more for right person.
post.title: Datacomm background - contractor (position must be filled by August 23)
